snippet.title: Rollin' Rascal Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
⬇️⬇️Follow the Kickstarter here:⬇️⬇️
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/curiomatic/rollin-rascal

(This game is in early development, game footage is not final.)

Rollin’ Rascal will bring the fast-paced action of classic Sonic games and mix it with the rich world interactions of Super Mario Bros. in an experience that appeals to classic speedsters while remaining accessible for newcomers to these exciting gameplay genres.

Starting today, we’ll begin posting about the game and its development. We have loads of concepts, characters, levels, gameplay, and story to share with you, so be sure to follow if you don’t want to miss anything! While development hast been steadily progressing, we’re aiming to take it into overdrive throughout the next year.

Wondering how you can help? Rollin’ Rascal will be launching a Kickstarter campaign on February 6th, 2024. We’ll have a series of rewards for those that choose to support the game’s production, including a handful of early-bird specials. Your generous contributions will directly fund Rollin’ Rascal’s production as we head toward the finish line. Once the campaign launches, we’ll be releasing a public demo of the game, so everyone can get a taste for how the game is shaping up!

Stay tuned for more details on the campaign as we approach its launch date. A big thank you to Gabriel for sharing his vision with us! Production has been a very fulfilling experience for the team, and we’d like to thank our fans that have supported us for so many years as we’ve grown as a team. We can’t wait to show you more of Rollin’ Rascal!

TWITTER: http://twitter.com/curiomatic
PATREON: http://patreon.com/curiomatic
DISCORD: https://discord.gg/fqFEAsh

Business Email - Team@Curiomatic.com
